name: footnote
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a note printed at the bottom of a page that gives extra information about something that has been written on that page
[ C usually singular ] an event, subject, or detail that is not important: footnote in history His tumultuous triumph five years ago now seems like little more than a footnote in history.
